nodes.text: Star Wars Launch Bay is an attraction found at various Disney theme parks featuring exhibits, memorabilia, and movie props based on the Star Wars films. Guests can also have photos taken with costumed characters and purchase various merchandise. The attraction was announced at Disney's D23 Expo on August 15, 2015 during a presentation discussing other upcoming attractions. It opened later that year at Disneyland on November 16 and Disney's Hollywood Studios on December 4, then at Shanghai Disneyland on June 16, 2016.
The crawl is seen on the floor leading to the main area
